message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9000 is unfortunately below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down a bit further.  How about $9500?  I'm confident this price still provides you great value for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8800? I think this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to me.
